item.title: Dragon Ash - Life goes on

작곡: kj / 작사: kj
KY: 41199 / KY: 25143

No one’s gonna

stop my flow yeah

The lilies are still

in full bloom you know

rule out your way

So many case da

life goes on

many lives

every line

let me go faith way

little thing
